title: Integrate GraphQL for Data Interactions
summary: Implement GraphQL to facilitate efficient data interactions between dAIX and third-party systems. This includes setting up a GraphQL server and defining schemas for data queries and mutations.

review_states.comment: The GraphQL server setup is solid, and the schemas for data queries and mutations are well-defined and documented. Integration tests passed, and data retrieval and manipulation via GraphQL are working smoothly. Approved! Let's get this merged.
I ran the basic queries and mutations, and they work perfectly. Everything is accurate and efficient. LGTM, approved! This is ready to merge.

title: Implement Kubernetes Cluster Setup for dAIX
summary: Set up a Kubernetes cluster to host the dAIX application, providing the foundational infrastructure for automated scaling.

review_states.comment: The cluster creation looks solid and I can access it without any issues. However, the deployment YAML files are missing resource limits. Please add those.
The documentation is clear on accessing the cluster, but it would be helpful to include a section on managing container configurations, especially regarding scaling policies.

title: Set Up Monitoring and Alerts for dAIX Scaling
summary: Integrate monitoring tools to track the performance and scaling events of the dAIX application, and set up alerts for critical scaling events.

review_states.comment: The integration with Prometheus and Grafana looks solid. The dashboards are clear and provide a good overview of the scaling metrics. Nice work on setting up the alerts too, they seem well-configured for critical events. LGTM, approved! Let's get this merged.

The dashboards are really intuitive, and I appreciate the detailed documentation you included. The alerts are comprehensive and should keep us well-informed of any anomalies. Great job! LGTM, approved as well!
